column5: I will heading up to Sandy Beach Lodge on Trout Lake near Red Lake in a few weeks any fishing reports or advise would be helpful.
Old thread here……. Anybody willing to report on their experience at this place more recently?
Been there,if I go to trout lake again,Booi's resort gets my money for sure,it's been a few years since I was there so not so recent.
Just came back from Cat Island, fishing was excellent!
I'm going the end of the month. Anything in particular that worked best tackle/bait wise? Thanks!

A couple guys I work with went 2-3 years ago. They said fishing was great on all spots they fished. If I recall, they boated a few 40'+ pike for the week plus several hundred eyes and buckets of perch. I didn't go, it's kind of pricey imo. I worked with one of the lodges owners sons for a few years, but couldn't get a "friends/co-workers" discount though.
